attributes.action: to not use teachers opinion and predicted grades in A levels and GCSEs
attributes.additional_details: fairest way it’s what work you do not some teacher who may or may not like you gives you predicted grade and their opinion on your work teachers shouldn’t have a say on this matter they can be biased generous an up a grade higher teachers woun’t do this for everyone only student they like that’s what happened last year it’s not fair please should purely be based on your work teacher might not give enough evidence of what you did so don’t let them post grade pls bring someone else to not fair for
attributes.background: to make grades based on big bits of classroom work, little assessments, coursework teachers can base it up to who they like and dislike, if they like a student say student got 4 teacher would be generous and give student 5 or 6 or say teacher disliked, student got 6 teacher gave 5. Wouldn’t be fair(

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562814
